info.title: Workday HCM
info.description: Workday HCM contains operations that expose Workday Human Capital Management Business Services data, including Employee, Contingent Worker and Organization information.

post.description: Creates or updates address information for a person.
Creates or updates phone information for a person.

post.summary: Add or Update Email Address Information
post.description: Creates or updates email address information for a person.

post.summary: Add or Update Instant Messenger Information
post.description: Creates or updates instant messenger information for a person.

post.summary: Add or Update Web Address Information
post.description: Creates or updates web address information for a person.

get.description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee and his/her Personal (e.g. Biographic, Demographic, etc.) information.

parameters.name: SystemIDType
parameters.description: The type of system ID to use, either Employee ID or Workday ID.

parameters.name: SystemID
parameters.description: The integration system identifier, part of a key that uniquely identify integratable object.

get.description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee identity (e.g. Government IDs, Visas, Passports, etc.) information.

parameters.name: SystemIDType
parameters.description: The type of system ID to use, either Employee ID or Workday ID.

parameters.name: SystemID
parameters.description: The integration system identifier, part of a key that uniquely identify integratable object.

get.description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee education and professional qualification information.

parameters.name: SystemIDType
parameters.description: The type of system ID to use, either Employee ID or Workday ID.

parameters.name: SystemID
parameters.description: The integration system identifier, part of a key that uniquely identify integratable object.

get.description: This operation retrieves data related to an Employee and his/her Employment (e.g. Position, Job, Status, etc.) information.

parameters.name: SystemIDType
parameters.description: The type of system ID to use, either Employee ID or Workday ID.

parameters.name: SystemID
parameters.description: The integration system identifier, part of a key that uniquely identify integratable object.

get.summary: When an employee is added or updated
get.description: This event is raised when an employee is added or updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work, add or update an employee in your Workday instance.

parameters.name: dateCriteria
parameters.description: Specify whether to use effective date or updated date for employee events.

parameters.name: businessProcessType
parameters.description: Filter employee events based on the business process type.

CountryRegionID.title: Region ID
CountryRegionID.description: E.g. type WA for Washington state, CA for California etc.
